Name: KoopaStatueVomit
Notes: A statue of Bowser that turns around when activating its SW_B switch. The actual laser beam is created by a separate object called ElectricRail.

Obj_arg0.Name: Rotates Right?
Obj_arg0.Description: If set, it will rotate to the right. Otherwise, it will rotate to the left.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_DEAD.Description: Can be activated when the object is killed through a cutscene action.

SW_A.Description: If used, this will get activated after the turning around.

SW_B.Description: When used, the statue will rotate when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

DemoCast.Description: Can take part in a cutscene.
